      • acceptClient

        public void acceptClient()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        BLOCKS until it accepts a client or until the serverSOTimeout if set
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • acceptClient

        public void acceptClient(int soTimeOut)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        BLOCKS until it accepts a client or until the serverSOTimeout if set. Argument soTimeOut is for the individual clients that have been accepted, to set timeout on their bufferedReader.readLine() calls.
        Parameters:
        soTimeOut - timeout in milliseconds. If value = 0, taken to be infinite timeout
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • closeServer

        public void closeServer()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the client sockets and the server
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
